a state in the southeastern US, whose capital city is Nashville: He returned to Tennessee to study law. Tennessee is not the only state in trouble.
More examplesFewer examplesSeventeen national guardsmen from Tennessee were injured in the storm.I'm from Memphis, Tennessee.
